item.title: 100 writing days
item.description: Previously I did 100 reading days, but looking back, I think It was mostly about achieving consistency rather than improving pronunciation.

item.title: Basic memory management
item.description: Last fall, I had an interview. They asked me about differences between heap and stack, how references and variables are stored.

item.title: C++ Memory model
item.description: Memory is a two column table. First row contains addresses, second row contains values. 1 int x = 4; When variable is assigned, an empty memory row cell is chosen.
